meanings.definition: A small, brightly colored finch bird.
meanings.sent1: The serins chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of serins flying together in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The serins had a singing competition in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as sweet as a serins' song.
meanings.sent5: The serins' vibrant feathers stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: To sing or chirp in a melodious manner.
meanings.sent1: She serins softly while walking in the park.
meanings.sent2: The birds outside my window serins every morning.
meanings.sent3: The children tried to serins along with the radio.
meanings.sent4: His guitar playing serins through the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The wind serins through the trees, creating a peaceful melody.
